key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.misc.tablemodel.ColumnNameMapping
key.description:
Defines, whether ResultSetMetaData.getLabel() or ResultSetMetaData.getName() should be used to map column names into column indices.
Explaination: The JDBC specifications allow the use of both, column names and column labels to query a column. As the ResultSetTablemodel requires a one-to-one mapping between a column name and the column index we have to limit the use to one of them.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.misc.tablemodel.Module
key.description: A module definition. Please do not edit this entry.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.misc.tablemodel.TableFactoryMode
key.description: The tablemodel factory mode for the ResultSetTableModelFactory if set to "simple" the factory will always return a DefaultTableModel.
